ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:44 [Issue ID 4000-114624] urn:comicvine:4000-114624 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 09:08:27. [Issue ID 114624]
ComicInfo.Summary: Everyone GOES! TOO! FAR! in this penultimate chapter of the Mighty Marvel Monsterpiece which is World War Hulk. The Incredible Hulk and his Warbound companions? They go too far! Dr. Strange? He goes WAY too far! Iron Man and Mr. Fantastic? They learn the precise definition of "too far" as the Hulk delivers his final judgment from his stone throne in the Great Arena!
ComicInfo.Teams: Warbound,New Avengers,New York Fire Department,Avengers,Fantastic Four,New York Police Department
ComicInfo.Title: Let the Worlds Within and the Worlds Without Tremble in Their Orbits
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Christina Strain,Danny Miki,David Finch,Frank D'Armata,John Romita Jr.,Klaus Janson
